WeLend Personal Loan Features
No-Doc Loan
For loan amounts of or under HK$100,000, income proof and address proof are not required.
Personnel-Free
With enhanced A.I., WeLend can provide instant credit assessment with real time quotation.
Wait-Free
Once application is confirmed, applicants can enjoy instant approval with immediate cash delivery.
Doubts-Free
Enhanced A.I. provides immediate solutions 24 hours a day.
Instant deposit via Faster Payment System
Loan deposit will be done instantly through Faster Payment System (FPS).
What is WeLend?
WeLend is Hong Kong’s first online lending platform with a mission to revolutionize traditional lending services since 2013. WeLend features:
1. Lower effective rate
WeLend is a solely online operator which can save a lot of costs on operation allowing customers to enjoy competitive interest rates and other benefits.
2. Ground Breaking Technology
WeLend adopts technology to revolutionize the traditional lending services to improve customer’s lending experiences e.g. instant approval and instant disbursement.
3. Rigorous Data Risk Management
With the use of technology, WeLend analyses big data and automatically assesses the degree of risk for instant quotation online.
4. Safe CyberSecurity
With comprehensive system security and monitoring measures, customer privacy is well protected.
How to Apply For WeLend Loan?
You can apply for WeLend Loan in 4 simple steps:
Step 1
Apply anytime anywhere online
Step 2
Upload required documents
Step 3
Enjoy Instant approval
Step 4
Identify Verification and disbursement
WeLend Loan Application Required Documents:
The following documents are required during the Welend Personal Loan application process for loan amount HK$100,000 or above:
HKID
Disbursement account proof
Proof of address
Income Proof
Fixed Salary : last 1 month
Commission based Salary: last 3 months
Real Estate Industry: last 6 months
WeLend Personal Loan FAQ
Are WeLend and WeLab related?
Yes. They are. WeLend is Hong Kong’s first online lending platform founded by Asia’s leading fintech group – WeLab.
How much WeLend can offer? What is the repayment period like?
WeLend provides loan amounts up to $600,000. It can be repaid between 14 days to as long as 60 months.
How long does it take for a WeLend personal loan to be approved?
Once application is confirmed, applicants can enjoy instant approval with immediate cash disbursement.
Can Hong Kong overseas workers apply for WeLend loan?
Only Hong Kong permanent resident who is at least 18 years of age with monthly income of at least HK$8,000 can apply for WeLend loan.
Who is eligible to apply for WeLend personal loan?
Applicant must be Hong Kong permanent resident who is at least 18 years of age and must fulfill below two requirements:
Stable employment: Employment at current job for at least 2 months
Repayment Ability: Monthly income of at least HK$8,000
What fees does WeLend charge for loan application?
With an aim of minimising any costs associated with loan application, WeLend does not charge any application fees. Also, WeLend does not impose any interest penalties on late repayment, but a HK$350 penalty fee will be applied.
What are the methods of repayments?
The easiest way to make repayment to Welend Personal Loan is through Direct Debit. All customers are required to set up Direct Debit Authorization for repayment.
How to settle loan payment early?
Customers can inform WeLend at least 30 days in advance via WhatsApp at 3706-9120 or email to cs@welend.hk to make early repayment.
How can WeLend Personal Loan help my bad credit score?
WeLend Card Debt Consolidation Loan can clear your outstanding debt altogether. If your debt can be cleared faster, your credit rating will be improved accordingly.
